name: Trick-Crow, Assaultwing
effect:
While this card is in a Monster Zone or face-up in the Extra Deck it is treated as an Effect Monster 
(Winged Beast/WIND/Level 7/ATK 2800/ DEF 2400) (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) with the following effect: When this card battles a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent, then, if this card destroyed an opponent's monster: banish one "Trick-Crow" card from your GY; draw one card.

When your opponent summons a monster in Attack Position: target that monster, and change it's battle position, and if you do, Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster
serial: This card cannot be used in a Duel.

pendulum.effect: Unless you have another "Trick-Crow" card in your other pendulum zone, this card's pendulum scale becomes 6
